t&cs apply:

(5/5)

👉 homophobic and hiv mistruths have no place in our society and industry and as musicians, we must spread compassion and love for the most marginalised people in our communities. 

a musician’s job is to bring people together.

(4/5)

👉 you can live a long and healthy life with hiv. treatment is so advanced that with one pill a day, hiv can become undetectable in your body so you can’t pass it onto other people.

(3/5)

👉 in america, a gay black man has a 50% lifetime chance of contracting hiv. stigma and shame around hiv and homosexuality is a huge driver of this vulnerability. we need to break down the myths and judgements and not fuel these.

(2/5)

👉 hiv has affected over 70 million people globally: men, women, children and the most vulnerable people in our communities.

did you know it’s #tvtalkshowhostday? a day chosen to be celebrated on the king of late night television’s birthday, johnny carson. here i am on the tonight show with him. i really liked johnny, but the best tv host in my opinion is you-know-who!! 😍 #fridayfavorite

#tbt to 2010 when phil and i caught a notre dame game here in new york, at yankee stadium! phil still loves to cheer on his alma mater. what's your alma mater? mine is usc. we rarely beat notre dame!! 😱😱
angela lansbury was a very sweet woman and so encouraging to other actors. i loved getting to know her even a little bit. i’m sure she’s in heaven continuing to  spread her kindness and grace. 😇😇

during fall, i love making filomena’s pumpkin loaf. it’s delicious! here's the recipe. if you try it out, share some pictures! #fridayfavorite
happy labor day! i hope that you're enjoying the long weekend before summer slips away! we’ve always loved good barbecue and good friends to share it with ! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
so sad to hear of the passing of olivia newton-john. she was as lovely and sweet as you hoped she'd be. your spirit lives on dear olivia.❤️

sunday is #nationalsistersday, and i am so thankful for my “baby" sister terre ❤️. terre always knows how to make me laugh. she’s the funniest person i know and the dearest .so today i’m recognizing her! how about your sister?? #fridayfavorite
happy fourth dear america! i hope you’ll always be the land of the free from sea to shining sea! ❤️🇺🇸❤️🇺🇸

each year as #fathersday comes around i think of my dearest daddy who gave so much love to his own children and the sick children of the world. i celebrate him with love, my darling husband & my brother tony, all great dads. god bless them all! for my father, always & forever.❤️
now we just have charlie. but there was a time when we had 3 goldens – huey, louie and dewey, we love our golden boys 🐶 #tbt

sometimes the most impactful acts of kindness are ones that go unrecognized. a group in winston-salem is making sure everyone is recognized for their kindness, from teachers to grocery store workers. what a great way to spread some love.❤️ #kindnessheroes
jason, a dear friend of mine, sent this to me. please read this in honor of the babies who died at their school and all who have died at the hands of gun violence. ❤️
this #memorialday i’d like to send love to those who have lost loved ones in service to our country. may your day be full of family, love, and pride. ❤️
yesterday was our 42nd anniversary ❤️. our friends vicky & max who are both comedians gave us their favorite jokes about marriage as a gift! so fun! hope u enjoy! ❤️❤️

my mom has been gone 22 years. but the memory of her singing and loving life is an image that is eternal !
happy mother’s day everyone🌹!

tomorrow is #husbandappreciationday. a good reminder to let our guys know how much they mean to  us. hey sweetheart !💕  i’m so thankful for you today and every day! #fridayfavorite

so sad to hear of dear tony walton’s passing. here we are in central park where somehow tony had talked the city into letting us put a carousel in the meadow for the opening of our free to be special! such a darling man and a remarkable talent. we will miss you, tony! ❤️
my valentine today and always ❤️! this sweet photo is one of my favorites, taken on our wedding day. how lucky it is to find your life time valentine.
